1.title: Complete Game Development Course
1.description: Finish comprehensive game development course covering Unity, Unreal Engine, and game design principles.

1.title: Release First Indie Game
1.description: Develop and release our first indie game on Steam and mobile platforms.

1.title: Establish Game Development Blog
1.description: Create and grow a game development blog with tutorials and industry insights.

1.title: Launch Game Development Education Platform
1.description: Create an online platform for teaching game development skills to others.

1.title: Attend Major Game Industry Conference
1.description: Participate in a major game industry conference to network and showcase our games.

2.title: Hardware Integration Research
2.description: Complete research on hardware integration for arcade machines including controls, sensors, and displays.

2.title: Prototype First Arcade Cabinet
2.description: Build a prototype arcade cabinet with custom controls and game integration.

2.title: Develop Arcade-Specific Game
2.description: Create a game specifically designed for arcade machine play with unique controls.

2.title: Open First Arcade Location
2.description: Establish our first physical arcade location featuring our custom machines.

3.title: 3D Attraction Prototype
3.description: Develop a prototype for an immersive 3D attraction combining VR and physical elements.

3.title: Simulator Technology Development
3.description: Research and develop motion simulator technology for theme park rides.

3.title: First Roller Coaster Design
3.description: Complete the design for our first game-themed roller coaster attraction.

3.title: Themed Environment Prototype
3.description: Create a prototype of a fully themed environment based on our game properties.

3.title: Theme Park Land Opening
3.description: Open our first themed land within an existing theme park.
